track.strDescriptionEN: "Back in Time" is a song by American rapper Pitbull, and was originally released as the lead single from the soundtrack of sci-fi film sequel, Men in Black 3. But for unknown reasons, it didn't make the final cut onto the soundtrack. The song plays during the end credits but is not featured on the soundtrack album. Instead, it was released as the lead single from his studio album Global Warming. The single was released via download on March 26, 2012, before being issued physically in Germany on May 25, 2012. The single to date has sold over 1.3 million copies digitally. The song's hook is a remixed soundbite from Mickey & Sylvia's song "Love is Strange".
